name: Westhunt v0.01f1
description:
In a fantasy version of the Wild west, witches are hunt relentlessly. For they spawn mindless destructive spirits into the mortal realm.

C.K. West is a witch herself. She'll hunt down countless cursed creatures that plague the land to clean her name. And even... Other witches!

You can follow the development of the game at: Twitter: @AlexDulDev or join our discord server https://discord.gg/W9H4bhV

.

Controls:

GAMEPAD

Left Stick:  Movement                                                        Right Stick:  Aim 

Left, up and right buttons:  Rune input                   Down button: Jump 

 Left Trigger: Shoot          Right Trigger: Skill (If 3 runes of the same type are active)

PC

WASD:  Movement       Mouse:  Aim 

1,2,3:  Rune input           Spacebar: Jump 

 Left Click: Shoot            Right Click: Skill (Only if 3 runes of the same type are active)
